title: Book design
content:
i am designing this artists book, i have just taken a screenshot of my book (its a concertina).   
would appreciate some advice on the typographic layout, how could i improve it to complement the artist's work (long, thin, elegant bottles).   
please ignore the guide lines.   
   
 [click here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016215923/http:/www.angelfire.com/realm2/peachpuff/book.jpg)
author: newbie_chez
